text: - Greetings, viewers.

It is I, Huey Duck, here
today to share with you
some of my favorite top tech.

We begin our list at number four
with Webby's thermal goggles.

Nobody plays the game of
darts quite like Webby, which
means she makes it terrifying.

The next item in my
top tech countdown
is Mark Beaks' hoverboard.

Although he's an
unsavory character,

even I must admit
travel is much more

efficient with the aid of a
self-balancing transporter.

Sometimes I wish
you'd talk normal.

Continuing to count down my
favorite pieces of technology,

number two is The
Spear of Selene.

Yes, few things are as
impressive as a craft

capable of exploring
the majesty of space.

That ship stranded our mom
on the moon for 10 years.

Which is why it's number
two and not number one.

The final item on my
top tech countdown
is the Gizmoduck armor.

With cybernetic armor
capable of flight,

it's easy to see why Fenton's
Gizmosuit secures my top honor.

Are you supposed to tell
everyone Fenton is Gizmoduck?
Oh, no.

Thanks for watching
my top tech countdown,

and please forget
that thing I said
about Fenton being Gizmoduck.
It was obviously a joke.

DEWEY DUCK: But you
don't tell jokes.

HUEY DUCK: Now Dewey is the
one who is telling jokes!
Ha!
Ha-ha!
